variables.name: Auto Install
variables.description: Auto run pip install on start

install.script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /home/container

if [ ! -f main.py ]; then
  echo 'print("Hello from Sodium!")' > main.py
fi

if [ -f requirements.txt ] && [ "$AUTO_INSTALL" = "true" ]; then
  pip install -r requirements.txt --user
fi

echo "Installation complete!"

files.main.py:
# Sodium Python Sandbox
import sys

print('Hello from Sodium!')
print(f'Python {sys.version}')
